title: Ask HN: Is it just me or GPT-4's quality has significantly deteriorated lately?
dot:
digraph GPT4_Deterioration{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style=filled, color=lightblue, fontname="Arial", fontsize=12];"Hacker News Post"[label="Ask HN: Is it just me or GPT-4's quality has significantly deteriorated lately?"];"User Experience"[label="User Experience: 
- Faster but less accurate
- Generates buggy code
- Less depth in answers
- More superficial responses
- Encourages external follow-up"];"Possible Explanations"[label="Possible Explanations:
- Cost optimization
- Safety and alignment
- Scaling issues
- Overuse of RLHF
- Quantization
- Plugin/Bing integration issues"];"Community Reactions"[label="Community Reactions:
- Disappointment
- Conspiracy theories
- Shift to other models
- Calls for open-source alternatives"];"Impact on Usage"[label="Impact on Usage:
- Reduced reliance
- Increased scrutiny
- Shift to API and other platforms"];"Future Outlook"[label="Future Outlook:
- Potential for better open-source models
- Need for benchmarking
- Ethical considerations
- Calls for regulation"];"Hacker News Post"->"User Experience"[color=blue, arrowhead=vee];"User Experience"->"Possible Explanations"[color=blue, arrowhead=vee];"Possible Explanations"->"Community Reactions"[color=blue, arrowhead=vee];"Community Reactions"->"Impact on Usage"[color=blue, arrowhead=vee];"Impact on Usage"->"Future Outlook"[color=blue, arrowhead=vee];"Cost Optimization"[label="Cost Optimization", color=lightcoral];"Safety and Alignment"[label="Safety and Alignment", color=lightcoral];"Scaling Issues"[label="Scaling Issues", color=lightcoral];"Overuse of RLHF"[label="Overuse of RLHF", color=lightcoral];"Quantization"[label="Quantization", color=lightcoral];"Plugin/Bing Integration Issues"[label="Plugin/Bing Integration Issues", color=lightcoral];"Possible Explanations"->"Cost Optimization"[color=darkblue, arrowhead=vee];"Possible Explanations"->"Safety and Alignment"[color=darkblue, arrowhead=vee];"Possible Explanations"->"Scaling Issues"[color=darkblue, arrowhead=vee];"Possible Explanations"->"Overuse of RLHF"[color=darkblue, arrowhead=vee];"Possible Explanations"->"Quantization"[color=darkblue, arrowhead=vee];"Possible Explanations"->"Plugin/Bing Integration Issues"[color=darkblue, arrowhead=vee];{rank=same;"Cost Optimization" "Safety and Alignment" "Scaling Issues" "Overuse of RLHF" "Quantization" "Plugin/Bing Integration Issues"}}
